Package hexanome.thirteen.server.model

Class VanillaCard

java.lang.Object
hexanome.thirteen.server.model.Card
hexanome.thirteen.server.model.VanillaCard
public class VanillaCard extends Card
Represents a basic vanilla card which is part of the original game.

  • Constructor Details

    • VanillaCard

      public VanillaCard(int prestigePoint, EnumMap<Token,Integer> cost, Token bonus, Rank rank, int cardId)
      Constructs a vanilla card.
      Parameters:
      prestigePoint - The number of prestige points that a card provides.
      cost - The associated cost of a card which includes the type of tokens.
      bonus - The bonus resource provided by a card.
      rank - The rank of a card which is given by a number from 1 to 3.
      cardId - The ID of associated with a card.
